meanings.sent1: The loud thunder frightens the little dog.
meanings.sent2: The horror movie always frightens me.
meanings.sent3: The tiny mouse frightens the big elephant in a funny way.
meanings.sent4: The darkness of the forest frightens me like a ghostly whisper.
meanings.sent5: The sudden scream in the quiet night frightens the entire neighborhood.

meanings.definition: To cause fear or terror in.
meanings.sent1: The haunted house frightens visitors every Halloween.
meanings.sent2: The ghost story frightens the children around the campfire.
meanings.sent3: The silly clown frightens the birthday party guests for a moment.
meanings.sent4: The eerie silence of the abandoned house frightens me to the core.
meanings.sent5: The howling wind outside frightens the old house with its ghostly whispers.
